projects.title: Predicting proteins interaction [Anu]
projects.description: Anu is a framework to test and benchmark ML models for predicting protein-protein interactions. It automates data retrieval, feature engineering and model evaluation process.

projects.title: Theme for JSDoc [clean-jsdoc-theme]
projects.description: Design and developed mobile responsive and customizable theme for JSDoc. Implement Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1.

projects.title: Spreadsheet [Leopard]
projects.description: Terminal based spreadsheet written in C++. This project gave me an idea of how GUI were developed.
